description_text:
This is proof I purchased a set before, in June  look at the top of this
order. I have no reason to lie but I do understand you'll position so
please have some understanding of mine. When you all retrieve your product,
please just send me my refund. This is unnecessary stress,  i only ordered
them from all because Amazon had dates of delivery close to three weeks
shipping out, but on yall's site it said 3 to seven days so that is the
reason iam stressed now, no fault of yall's. But truly I would like a
refund.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 5184 中
